Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2013 04:54PM 55yr_oldmom wrote: Thank You, Itsjustme10. Some of my cousins were telling me that they should have given my mom an answer on the stage of it and type. So my mom thought the doctor wasn't being a 100% truthful with us. God bless.
Posts.Title: In NYC. 55yr_oldmom 55yr_oldmom

Posts.Content: 55yr_oldmom wrote: Hi, I live in NYC. I was just diagnosed with breast cancer. But I have no stage or type.  I was wondering if anyone from NYC, who has already had surgery, has ever been seen by DR. Hank Schmidt from Mount Sinai? He seems to know what he is talking about, except for the fact, that I have had two biopsy, two ultrasounds, one MRI and a Pet scan, but as I mentioned earlier no stage or type. He has told me that until after the surgery, then that's when I will get the results of the type and stage, is this normal?  Thank You. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: In NYC. 55yr_oldmom 55yr_oldmom
